Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1978...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 3/2/1981 (Going to LA: C G. Carter. Going to PIT: SS C. Ripken Jr., P S. Howe, CF J. Eisenreich)...
Injured on 8/8/1982 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/5/1983, off Gorman Heimueller (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1983, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/18/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1984, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 8/9/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 4/18/1986...
Drove in 9 runs against Houston on 7/8/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1986, hitting .433 with 2 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1987, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 9/11/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1987, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1988, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 6/5/1988...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/9/1988...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1988, hitting .375 with 3 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1988, hitting .345 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1988, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1988, hitting .315 with 25 HR, 133 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/4/1989 to a 6-year deal worth $15,200,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/1/1989 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 5/11/1990...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 6/1/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1992, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1993, hitting .377 with 9 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 10/3/1994, off Steve Ontiveros (CHC)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/5/1995 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Injured on 10/15/1995 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
